value.title: Tesla announces it’s moving away from ultrasonic sensors in favor of ‘Tesla Vision’
value.excerpt: Tesla announced today that it is moving away from using ultrasonic sensors in its suite of Autopilot sensors in favor of its camera-only “Tesla Vision” system. Last year, Tesla announced it would transition to its “Tesla Vision” Autopilot without radar and start producing vehicles without a front-facing radar.
